item.title: The Biden economic boom.
item.description:
[Audio version here] Here is the biggest story you didn’t hear about over the weekend: The January jobs report was good. Very good. It was so good that it exceeded everyone’s expectations—including those of the White House. Given the (apparent) weak jobs reports for November and December, pundits were expecting more of the same in January. Sean…

URL: https://roberthubbell.substack.com/p/the-biden-economic-boom?utm_source=substack&utm_campaign=post_embed&utm_medium=web

item.title: Interview: Ryan Petersen, founder and CEO of Flexport
item.description:
For the last year or so, the global economy has been hammered by a massive supply chain crunch. The phenomenon is impossibly complex, encompassing a dizzying array of factors — demand shifts, the shift to e-commerce, Chinese industrial crackdowns, Covid, inflation, legacy regulations, trade imbalances, and much much more. But a small moment of clarity a…

URL: https://noahpinion.substack.com/p/interview-ryan-petersen-ceo-of-flexport?utm_source=substack&utm_campaign=post_embed&utm_medium=web

source: The Fed Has Done an Amazing Job!
